overview: Peter Rabbit is a dynamic re-imagining of Beatrix Potter?s timeless children?s classic. Follow our hero Peter and his friends Benjamin and Lily as they build a spectacular new sledge and take Mrs Tiggy-Winkle home for winter hinernation. When Tommy Brock takes Cotton-Tail's dolly, Peter soon discovers the only way to retrieve it is to give everyone in the woods what they want for Christmas...
title: Peter Rabbit: The Christmas Star
